House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07934
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING A FIVE PERCENT (5%) BUDGETARY ALLOCATION OF BARANGAYS FOR THE IMPLEMENTATION OF PROGRAMS, PROJECTS, ACTIVITIES, AND SERVICES FOR SENIOR CITIZENS, AMENDING FOR THIS PURPOSE THE PERTINENT PROVISIONS OF REPUBLIC ACT 7160, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "LOCAL GOVERNMENT CODE" AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Proposes to authorize the allocation of five percent (5%) of the total internal revenue allotment for barangays for the welfare of senior citizens and to provide financial aid to those indigent elderly in need.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
